title:
Analyze the input image of incoming request without deployment. The request either contains an image stream
with any content type ['image/*', '"application/octet-stream'], or a JSON payload which includes a url
property to be used to retrieve the image stream. An image stream of content type 'image/png' is returned,
where the pixel values depend on the analysis mode. The returned image has the same dimensions as the input image
for modes: foregroundMatting. The returned image has the same aspect ratio and same dimensions as the input image
up to a limit of 16 megapixels for modes: backgroundRemoval.
